text: The first flag of Panama was made by Mar√≠a Ossa de Amador. The flag of Panama was created in March 1925. == Appearance == It consists thus of a divided rectangle of four quarters: the upper field close to the pole white with a blue star of five points; the upper field further from the pole, red; the lower field near the pole, blue; and the lower one further from the pole, white with a red star of five points. == Meaning == White represents peace to make a home in the new place. The blue color represents the conservative party; the color red, the liberal party. == References == Panama Category:National symbols of Panama
title: Flag of Panama
